T02D2952:30b-0: @30b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2952:30b-1: phyogs skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar
T02D2952:30b-2: 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas
T02D2952:30b-3: gnas khang yid dang mthun par phyogs skyong ba rnams
T02D2952:30b-5: sa'i cho ga la sogs pa dbang bskur ba bzhin byas la /
T02D2952:30b-6: dkyil 'khor gru gsum shin tu mnyam zhing legs par byas la thig btab ste /
T02D2952:30b-7: dbus su grub bzhi pa dmar por bya'o //
T02D2952:30b-8: de'i phyi rol du snam bu gru bzhi pa rin po che'i khang bcu bcu dang bcas pa bri'o //
T02D2952:30b-9: sgo ni rigs dang mthun par bris la bum pa bcu gcig rgyan rnams kyis brgyan la /
T02D2952:30b-10: lha so so'i gnas su bzhag ste /
T02D2952:30b-11: bcu po'i mgul bar dar sna tshogs pas sprel rma bya dang me long gis bri'o //
T02D2952:30b-12: gtso bo'i bum pa la gzungs thag bzhi btags la /
T02D2952:30b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi rdo rje bzhi la brtod la bzhag go //
T02D2952:30b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rnams su hom bcu brtsigs la
T02D2952:30b-15: bgegs rnams kyi ming byang dang bcas pa bya ste
T02D2952:30b-16: ci rigs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2952:30b-17: mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor pa dang /
T02D2952:30b-18: rab tu gtsang ma'i ba lim chen po bcu gcig
T02D2952:30b-19: gis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor la bzhag go
T02D2952:30b-20: // gtor ma de dag re re la lha bshos
T02D2952:30b-21: dang mar me dang spos dang shog shog gi gdugs
T02D2952:30b-22: // re dang / dar dmar po'i ba dan dang /
T02D2952:30b-25: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag shul
T02D2952:30b-26: gyi snying po ji ltar rigs pas mtha' brten par
T02D2952:30b-27: bya ste / de nas bgegs bsal ba la sogs
T02D2952:30b-28: pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas la dbus su rdo
T02D2952:31a-0: bya ste / rje @31a * // rnam 'joms sku mdog dmar por bsgyur la bya'o //
T02D2952:31a-1: de yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis sbyan drang ngo //
T02D2952:31a-2: de nas phyogs skyong ba'i so so'i phyag rgyas so
T02D2952:31a-3: so'i bum par sbyan drangs te go rims kyis snying
T02D2952:31a-4: po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
T02D2952:31a-13: de dag gi mtha' yang dza dang h'um dang phat dang ste /
T02D2952:31a-14: sde bzhi zhi rgyas kyis dbye'o //
T02D2952:31a-15: de ltar so so'i bum pa'i nang du padma dang
T02D2952:31a-16: zla ba'i steng du brgya byin ser po lag na
T02D2952:31a-17: rdo rje thogs pa btsun mo dang lhan cig tu
T02D2952:31a-18: glang po cha zhon pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-19: me lha ni drang srong gi cha lugs dang dbyu gu dang /
T02D2952:31a-21: bgrang phreng dang blugs gzar thogs pa mdog dmar po ral zhon pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-22: gshin rje mdog nag po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
T02D2952:31a-23: pa pe con thogs pa ma he la zhon pa
T02D2952:31a-24: bskyed do // lho nub kyi bum par bden bral mdog dmar po mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2952:31a-25: lag na ral gri thogs pa mi la zhon pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-26: nub tu chu lha mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2952:31a-27: padma dang zhags pa thogs pa bum pa sngon po'i steng na 'dug pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-28: nub byang du rlung lha mdog dud ka bsil yab thogs ba 'khor lo la zhon pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-29: byang du ku be ra mdog sna tshogs pa dbyug to thogs ba rta la zhon pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-30: byang shar du dbang ldan mdog dkar po la mgrin
T02D2952:31a-31: pa sngo ba glang mchog sngon po la zhon pa
T02D2952:31a-32: lag pa bzhi la sbrul se ral khar thogs pa
T02D2952:31a-33: gcig gis ral gri gcig na mdung rtse gsum pa
T02D2952:31a-34: / g-yas yum dka' thub zlog ma la 'khyud pa
T02D2952:31a-35: lag pa gcig gis dam pa sbyin pa bskyed do
T02D2952:31a-36: / // steng du zla ba ni mdog dkar po padma thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-37: dang pa la zhon pa mdun du bud med rnga ma'i bsil yab thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-38: de nyid kyi bum par nyi ma mdog dmar bar bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-39: lag pa na padma thogs pa bskyed do //
T02D2952:31a-40: yang dbang ldan gyi 'og ste 'og gi phyogs su
T02D2952:31a-41: sa'i lha mo lte ba man chad dmar mo yan
T02D2952:31a-43: rin po che sna tshogs pas brgyan pa lag na rin po che'i gter gyi bum pa thogs pa /
T02D2952:31a-44: sbrul la zhon pa bskyed do//
T02D2952:31b-0: @31b de ltar bskyed la aa las byung ba'i ye shes sems dpa' sbyan drangs te /
T02D2952:31b-1: so so'i snying po thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhugs pa de /
T02D2952:31b-2: de kun gyi snying ga nas so so'i sngags kyi phreng ba la dmigs la /
T02D2952:31b-4: na ma: tsanda badzra kro dh'a ya /
T02D2952:31b-17: ti li ti li bandha bandha sv'a h'a zhes bum pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D2952:31b-19: phyogs skyong dang gtso bo la bstod pa la sogs pa ci rigs par byas la rol mo dang /
T02D2952:31b-20: sil snyan rnams kyis rab tu mnyes par bya zhing
T02D2952:31b-21: spos dang 'o ma la sogs pas mchod pa'am sbyin
T02D2952:31b-22: sreg bya'o // de nas slob ma las thams cad
T02D2952:31b-23: pa'i bum pas khrus chu nas bton nas gos gsar
T02D2952:31b-24: pa gyon te mandal dbul ba la sogs pa bya
T02D2952:31b-25: sreg bya'o // ste / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
T02D2952:31b-27: gang la phog pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bstan cing /
T02D2952:31b-28: de nyid kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go //
T02D2952:31b-29: de nas sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dang bcas pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2952:31b-30: dbang bskur ba bzhin du cho ga'i lhag ma ma lus par bya'o //
T02D2952:31b-31: de nas yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas gtor ma'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2952:31b-32: de nas byin gyis brlab pa yang tshul bzhin du
T02D2952:31b-33: byas la gtor ma de dag la dar sna tshogs
T02D2952:31b-34: dang gdugs dang bcas pas snang gsal sbang ste ri
T02D2952:31b-35: mthon po'am nags tshal stug por bskyal lo //
T02D2952:31b-36: dung la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2952:31b-37: sgrub pa po rnams kyang rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa la /
T02D2952:31b-38: lag pa dang rkang pa'i gar dang ldan pas nyi ma rtse shar la bskyal /
T02D2952:31b-39: nang du log la bgegs mnan pa'i cho ga bya /
T02D2952:31b-42: bla ma la yon dbul lo //
T02D2952:31b-43: bsod nams rdzogs pa'i don du ston mo bya /
T02D2952:31b-44: cho ga'i lhag chad kha bskang ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa bzlas /
T02D2952:31b-45: lha rnams slob ma dang gnyis su med par bstim /
T02D2952:31b-46: snying padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2952:31b-47: slob mas bla ma la yon phul la dga' ba dang yi rang bar bya'o //
